Title: Universal Soldier: Day of Reckoning
Writer: John Hyams (screenplay), Doug Magnuson (screenplay), Jon Greenhalgh (screenplay), John Hyams (story), Moshe Diamant (story), Richard Rothstein (based on characters created by), Christopher Leitch (based on characters created by)
Actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dolph Lundgren, Scott Adkins, Mariah Bonner
Plot: John looks to take down Luc Deveraux after a home invasion claims his wife and daughter. The fight pits John against Andrew Scott and an army of genetically enhanced warriors; meanwhile, he must contend with a UniSol in relentless pursuit.
